message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that the money devalues faster for you.
I'm happy to accept a 60/40 split in my favor, Alice. This reflects the higher devaluation of the money for me, but also acknowledges that you're taking the risk of having to make a counter-offer.
Bob, your offer was tempting, but still not quite fair. I'm willing to compromise, but I need you to meet me closer to the middle.
